name: htmlquickstart
title: HTMLQuickstart
description: HTMLQuickstart is a Raycast extension that lets you create and link the basic website files with just a few clicks. It generates a folder on your desktop with the necessary files, including an index.html file, style.css file, script.js file. This extension is perfect for developers and students who want to save time and focus on their creative work.
author: Spaceman

commands.name: htmlqs
commands.title: htmlqs
commands.subtitle: Create file layout for Website project
commands.description: Simply enter a name for your project and click create to quickly generate the html css and javascript file in the folder. HTMLQuickstart is easy to use and helps you get your projects up and running in no time.
